website_summaries.verdict: This little black fireplace bellows is perfectly sized for  camping trips to ensure your blaze lasts as long as you need.
pros: Convenient faux leather loop for hanging
cons: This fireplace bellows is on the small side

customer_reviews.title: but we are very happy with the one we're using at home
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these, one to use at home, where we have a fireplace inside, and two chimineas (Husband-man is demonstrating the bellows at one of them in the picture) and a fire pit outside. We haven't used one camping yet, but we are very happy with the one we're using at home. They both came in good shape, the size is fine - they're easy to hold - and they work a LOT better than waving a paper plate at the fire, or getting down to blow on it.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Law

customer_reviews.title: A must have for a wood stove
customer_reviews.text: If you have a wood stove, you know about trying to start a fire with just a few coals. You know about almost hyperventilating from blowing on it to get it to light off. This will make your life SO much easier. I just bought 3 for Christmas gifts to family members with wood stoves since I love mine so much.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn B.

customer_reviews.title: Ehh
customer_reviews.text: Poor materials used. It felt more like a novelty item than anything kinda like it was made to be fake and kinda work. Melted almost right away had to tape it up and it worked pretty good for a while then all the pins holding the bag just fell out for normal use. Didn’t even have it for 6 months
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality workmanship, looks great and works perfectly. So much better, faster and easier to use than my old one that was leaking air regardless of how much duct tape I added!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Cute, Works
customer_reviews.text: These cute little bellows do the trick for us. They're small (a plus), so require active, full-throttle squeezing/blowing to oxygenate a budding or laggard hardwood fire. For us they work great, always bringing flames back to life.
customer_reviews.author: Bart Windrum

customer_reviews.title: Very firm insoles
customer_reviews.text: I should have bought a bigger size than this. Bought this for my grandson to use when we're starting a fire to roast marshmallows. They worked but we ended up using an old Pizza Pan and waving that over the fire to get it hot.
customer_reviews.author: CORINNIA MCALLISTER

customer_reviews.title: IT BLOWS ?
customer_reviews.text: GREAT BELLOW. DID NOT KNOW HOW MUCH AIR I WAS LOSING WITH MY 25 YEAR OLD LEAKY BELLOW.
customer_reviews.author: DMOE

customer_reviews.title: MUST HAVE FOR CAMP FIRE!
customer_reviews.text: Bellows are a major game changer for camp fires. If you have ever felt like you were about to pass out face first in the fire from blowing on it, this is for you! I almost went with a smaller version but after seeing it in person, I would go no smaller than this and almost wish I went bigger. Just make sure you don't leave them outside because the leather/pleather can dry rot.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Does the job!
customer_reviews.text: After continually sticking my face close to our open woodstove and blowing to get a fire going, it occurred to me that there's a solution for that! I looked at several bellows and chose this one based on reviews and cost. No, it's not real leather but it seems like reasonable quality and does what I need it to do and saves my breath. ;)
customer_reviews.author: Ginia

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about buying this after reading some of the reviews but I'm impressed by how nice it looks and works. I've had it for 4 months and used it all winter with the fireplace and still using it outside on the fire pit.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Fireplace Best Buddy
customer_reviews.text: Wish I purchased 20 years ago. Not sure what took so long for owning wood bellows but I bought one of the best on market. Keeps a fire going and going and going. Great craftsmanship and quality materials make this my fireplace buddy.
customer_reviews.author: CJ Mautz

customer_reviews.title: No air. Tried it, worked a month, lost the crucial rivet
customer_reviews.text: The rivets are stick in shallow wood like thumbtacks. It didn't take me a month to lose the crucial rivet in the center nozzle end. I fixed it with my own wood screw but its a.matter of time before i lose another.
customer_reviews.author: K. Demsky

customer_reviews.title: Gets the coals hot!
customer_reviews.text: I have been having a fireplace fire going for almost every day this month. I can't tell you how many dizzy days we had before purchasing this tool. Seems to have good consruction and material. No issues with airflow and use.
customer_reviews.author: David C. Brock Jr

customer_reviews.title: Nice bellows.
customer_reviews.text: Works well. The small leather piece that functions as a hanger could be a bit thicker so it would not slip out of the hole, but I don’t care if it hangs. I just lay it on my wood pile. It is pretty too.
customer_reviews.author: Katrina

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Does the job, but the bellows material is not the most sturdy so I can see it tearing with a lot of use, or vigorous use. Can't beat the price though, so on a value for money basis it's pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: Allison B

customer_reviews.title: This is garbage dont buy.
customer_reviews.text: Garbage, used it for a couple weeks an it blew out already. Cheap materials used, you would have better luck with a cardboard fan. Also the squeaky noise is makes as your using it is dreadful. I guess they couldn't splurge for 2c worth of oil to mitigate it.
customer_reviews.author: Fireuser

customer_reviews.title: Kinda works, but flimsy.
customer_reviews.text: Cheap Made in China crap. It works, barely, and I don't expect it to last more than a year or two. Feels like a toy.
customer_reviews.author: PartisanGerm

customer_reviews.title: Decently made.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a Christmas gift for my dad. The craftsmanship is good but not amazing. It seems pretty hardy. For the money it’s a decent buy.
customer_reviews.author: Susan L. Miller

customer_reviews.title: good product
customer_reviews.text: we use this for when we build an outside fire in our fire pit or when we have a large bonfire. it does the trick!
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl J.

customer_reviews.title: Great Stuf!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic story is with a fireplace I looked construction and it was a very rapid delivery so I think you for that
customer_reviews.author: Tamara Worman

customer_reviews.title: Its good but not a huge bellows like i am used too
customer_reviews.text: Its not as big as tge last one but it matches the set and gets the job done. I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Gaven

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Met my expectations. Use in larger wood stove to stoke up the fires.
customer_reviews.author: TexasReviewer2010

customer_reviews.title: Functional
customer_reviews.text: Works great, looks amazing, could use an material upgrade on vinyl section,but still amazing
customer_reviews.author: Al co

customer_reviews.title: well made and sturdy but small
customer_reviews.text: is a little small but good for close and small uses
customer_reviews.author: odiegh

customer_reviews.title: Not a good product
customer_reviews.text: The product start to follow completely apart after the first use. I suggest paying more and getting a better quality product. This one is in the trash already.
customer_reviews.author: Deegs4444

customer_reviews.title: Great Bellows
customer_reviews.text: The bellows look great and worked very well. Will buy another for a friend!
customer_reviews.author: Lars S.

customer_reviews.title: A lifesaver to a dying flame!
customer_reviews.text: I’m not the best builder of fires but I have found my self in a situation where I must heat my home with a wood stove. I am so thankful for this tool that allows me to salvage a dying flame so the fir will catch again.
customer_reviews.author: M Miller

customer_reviews.title: Best bellows for the money
customer_reviews.text: I love this! The last I bought just didn’t seem as well made and study, as this gem!
customer_reviews.author: KRISTIN N.

customer_reviews.title: Bellows
customer_reviews.text: We heat almost 100% with wood and this helps a great deal to start a good fire or get a slow fire burning better. Our old bellows was all cracked and barely put out a puff of air. This new one is well made and works great! Very happy with it. Great price too.
customer_reviews.author: Very happy!

customer_reviews.title: YESSSSSS
customer_reviews.text: You NEED this for your winter fireplace! Just enuf POOOF to get it flaring!
customer_reviews.author: Linda Carlson

customer_reviews.title: Up to u
customer_reviews.text: Cute as a decorative item but to use everyday to get a wood fire going. It’s just not up to it. Within a couple of weeks the pleather was shot on one the other has the tacks coming out
customer_reviews.author: George Allen Martin

customer_reviews.title: Budget Blower
customer_reviews.text: The grand kids loved an old one to destruction but are happy to puff the logs back to life with this one.
customer_reviews.author: R.S. Lowry

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and performance!
customer_reviews.text: Sure beats blowing on the coals to get fire started! Perfect size and works great! Seems to be made well as we use it often.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ok it works but material is thin
customer_reviews.text: It works but falling apart quickly, the material is a thin vinyl. I will have to probably have to purchase and reupholster the piece. Other than that it works fine.
customer_reviews.author: Mario A. Valverde

customer_reviews.title: He’s very happy with this
customer_reviews.text: Fiancé got tired of blowing on the fire! He’s very happy with this!
customer_reviews.author: Candace Lovett

customer_reviews.title: Bellow
customer_reviews.text: My family thought that it would be a waste, but lol we all love it now, and now they think that it wa a great buy!
customer_reviews.author: sandra c. arviso

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: It blows air, but the leather cord broke about 10 minutes after I unpacked this. So far it still does its job, but it does not give me a lot of hope for the quality
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this in July and wanted to use before I reviewed this item. The tip of the bellows fell off after a few weeks of use. Would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Good deal for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Good for the price. The fake leather bubbles if you keep it near the heat for long periods. We've had it for a while now and its survived a good amount of abuse with only minor aesthetic damage.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Quality product for great price
customer_reviews.text: Made well and works perfectly. Nothing to complain about here. Does exactly what it's supposed to do.
customer_reviews.author: Jennie Hunt

customer_reviews.title: Won't use much
customer_reviews.text: Much smaller than expected. Does not help much. Just blowing on the embers seems to work better than this tool.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Works great for our indoor fire place. A little bit more volume would be nice but still a good Bellow
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Loud squeaking noise after 3 days of use
customer_reviews.text: It works like any would but it has a horrendous squeak noise after 3 days of use
customer_reviews.author: alek frizado

customer_reviews.title: Just okay
customer_reviews.text: I guess you get what you pay for. It was flimsier than anticipated.
customer_reviews.author: julian bramlett

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended
customer_reviews.text: The pins started coming out within the first few weeks of use. Now the metal tip is loose and can't keep it tight.
customer_reviews.author: Randall

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for us
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for a home fireplace/wood stove. Works great and is made to be sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Scudder

customer_reviews.title: Great Value and Product
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Have had many before and this one seems to be the best I’ve ever had.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond Bernadisius

customer_reviews.title: It works really well
customer_reviews.text: I liked the material and craftsmanship best. It looks very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for it serves it's purpose I think it'll hold up a few years.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Grice

customer_reviews.title: Solid Choice
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the price. Solidly built and great for stoking fires.
customer_reviews.author: Felicia R.

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: Works well. Smaller air pouch than my last one but does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Nickeyblaze

customer_reviews.title: Looks good, works marginally well
customer_reviews.text: Does not blow enough air. You have to get it too close to the fire
customer_reviews.author: Col. Myles A. "Mike" Rohrlick

customer_reviews.title: The quality is not good
customer_reviews.text: This product was made poorly and parts start filling apart. Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy C.

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: It's not as bit as I was hoping, but it's still absolutely wonderful to use at the fireplace
customer_reviews.author: C W

customer_reviews.title: A fireplac must have
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my son-in-law and he has been extremely happy with his gift!
customer_reviews.author: Diane K.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Works fantastic! Don’t know why I never had one in the past.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does NOT “blow”!
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves keeping the fire going and this bellow works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Adamson

customer_reviews.title: If you heat your house by burning wood get this!
customer_reviews.text: If you heat your house by burning wood this is a must have.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas DeOnier

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: This is my first experience with bellows and these (this?) seems small to me. It is definitely okay, but I don't really know the finer points of evaluating it. I ordered because my husband wanted it and the price was good. He likes it and says it works. He uses the bellows rarely, not even once a day. And we heat our house by wood stove, so we have a fire most of the coldest part of the winter. He says it works when he needs it and saves him a lot of time. This bellows is small, so keep that in mind.
customer_reviews.author: Sierra Gentleheart

customer_reviews.title: Definitely small, if that's what you need.  Works fine for the size.
customer_reviews.text: Well, I don't really have much of a space constraint around my full sized fireplace, so this turned out to be smaller than I really needed, requiring many more pumps than I expected to stoke the flames. That said, the quality is excellent, it looks good, and it does work, so I'd definitely recommend it if you need a compact bellows.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Samad

customer_reviews.title: Windy!
customer_reviews.text: Blows hard. My first order arrived with the bellows missing, they ripped right out of the bottom of the envelope. The replacement had a bit of bubble pack around the spout so it didn’t puncture the packaging. I’m going to get a lot of use out of this bellows for my smoker and my wood stove.
customer_reviews.author: Maid of Porcelain

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice, might be a manufacturing flaw
customer_reviews.text: The bellows appears to be made well and has a good overall look to it. Mine had a problem though. The nozzle was sealed with adhesive they must use on the inside, so I was getting no airflow out of the nozzle. I had to use a rod and push it into the nozzle to break the glue clump apart. It works well now.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Item I Use EVERY Day
customer_reviews.text: Thank you. Best price. Good quality. Strong. Useful. It could be stronger and prettier, but it is truly very good and usable. I use it every day. Maybe if I look for a longer time I might find one at Craigslist or Offer up, but I was in a rush.
customer_reviews.author: Cat Door

customer_reviews.title: Save your breath!
customer_reviews.text: Save your breath and get a bellow. I got tired of blowing into hot fires and did some research and found this gem. It’s small and compact and gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I've wanted one for so long and found this one on Amazon. Great craftsmanship, real leather and wood, we've used it several times and it's perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Shelley Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: An Exquisite Turd
customer_reviews.text: Parts came apart. Thumb tacks fell off. Spout wasn't even attached when it arrived and air leaks out from all around. Complete and utter trash
customer_reviews.author: Blackbird

customer_reviews.title: Not enough volume of air
customer_reviews.text: Does not push enough air. Used it once and ended up blowing on the coals. That worked better. Maybe a larger size would work. This one was of minimal use.
customer_reviews.author: bitchymitchy

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend. It's small
customer_reviews.text: I use this on camping trips, and everyone is always so jealous! We actually found another one at an Estate sale, and now use this one in our house. I would recommend. It's small, but does the job!
customer_reviews.author: Keli

customer_reviews.title: This item was poorly made and/or shipped
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this sent to the home of friends. It arrived with the material forming the bladder for air intake and output detached from the body of the bellows. We heard of the problem too late to have it replaced, by the rules of this site. Our friends have patched it up as best they can.
customer_reviews.author: RKC

customer_reviews.title: This product absolutely met my expectations.
customer_reviews.text: The materials and construction are sturdy. The "nozzle" is substantial in comparison with my previous bellows. It works well in facilitating the fire in the wood burning stove.
customer_reviews.author: Jo A Sinclair

customer_reviews.title: Good Bellow
customer_reviews.text: The bellow worked well when using it for an indoor fireplace. It is on the smaller size, so you have to pump it quite a bit to get the fire going.
customer_reviews.author: ACH

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I just love bellows! These are no exception. They work as expected. Perfect for my fire pit.
customer_reviews.author: Trisha Kilpatrick

customer_reviews.title: Lasted one Winter
customer_reviews.text: It served its.purpose for only one season. At the end of the season the tip came off and the material started to come apart.
customer_reviews.author: Blue9782

customer_reviews.title: Great product that goes on easily and really stays put.
customer_reviews.text: I use this to help fire up the BBQ and for fireplace fires. Works really well and is of a nice size - not too big but with plenty of power to get those fires burning well.
customer_reviews.author: D. H.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Used multiple times already this season and is still working great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: love this
customer_reviews.text: gets the fire going fast & easy to use great value
customer_reviews.author: mainecoon56

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: We works great. Nice size. Does exactly what it’s meant to do.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanie

customer_reviews.title: High quality
customer_reviews.text: Very high quality and works well to get the hot coals turned into flames!
customer_reviews.author: Katie Reams

customer_reviews.title: A workout for the arms!!
customer_reviews.text: It works reasonably well, its nice looking so we kept it. It does require lots of effort on our part!
customer_reviews.author: Victorious

customer_reviews.title: Thar she blows
customer_reviews.text: Bought for daughter in law. I have one too. How did I live without?
customer_reviews.author: Empress Sandra

customer_reviews.title: Worthy Product!
customer_reviews.text: Great product just as described! Easy to use and works perfectly. I would buy it again!
customer_reviews.author: Brahmabull5

customer_reviews.title: Just Right...
customer_reviews.text: Good size and quality. Has been a wonderful addition this winter. My husband has been very pleased with it, and he is not an easy sell.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fell apart on first use
customer_reviews.text: Cute little bellows but the spout fell out first time it was used. Trash!
customer_reviews.author: Christine L. Schomer

customer_reviews.title: Works but por quality control
customer_reviews.text: The wood was gouged and damaged. The packaging was fine so it had to be a quality control problem
customer_reviews.author: Dalton Clemons

customer_reviews.title: You can probably do better!
customer_reviews.text: I think the product is nice and attractive but it doesn’t put out a lot of puff! The side leather is not real leather and it’s very thin and cracking. I don’t think it’ll hold out long!
customer_reviews.author: Bill Schindler

customer_reviews.title: Fun tool for the fire pit
customer_reviews.text: Got this to use at our outside fire pit, was surprised at how well it worked.
customer_reviews.author: JulieKayy

customer_reviews.title: Cheap for a reason.
customer_reviews.text: Fell apart after a month of use. I had to repair the studs on the “leather” and glue the metal nozzle back in after it fell out.
customer_reviews.author: Murican

customer_reviews.title: Little know fact
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for stoking a fire! What a difference it makes!!!!
customer_reviews.author: PatDown

customer_reviews.title: and this Bellows is the perfect addition to the fire pit
customer_reviews.text: Spring and summer fires by the pool, and this Bellows is the perfect addition to the fire pit.
customer_reviews.author: Gary A Vickery

product_meta.title: Tosnail 17" x 7.5" Wood Bellows Fireplace Bellows, Wood Air Bellows - Black
feature_bullets: Keeps that fire roaring, easily start your fire with a burst of air.
